blogPost.excerpt: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
blogPost.body: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
blogPost.title: Gumroad University - A guided tour of our best resources by creators for creators
blogPost.author: Philip Kiely

localize.description: GumRoad大学是一个精心策划的采访、挑战、指南、文档和研讨会的集合，旨在帮助创作者获得灵感，创造一些奇妙的东西，并成功地将其推向市场。
localize.tagline: 由创作者为创作者导览我们最好的资源

localize.description: GumRoad大學是一個精心策劃的採訪、挑戰、指南、文檔和研討會的集合，旨在幫助創作者獲得靈感，創造一些奇妙的東西，併成功地將其推向市場。
localize.tagline: 由創作者爲創作者導覽我們最好的資源

previous.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
previous.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付应用，你可以像发短信一样给全球任何人发钱。在Celo区块链平台的支持下，Valora是唯一一个能够实现无信任的移动交易的钱包，具有易于使用的UX，几乎零费用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一样向全球任何人发送资金

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付應用，你可以像發短信一樣給全球任何人發錢。在Celo區塊鏈平臺的支持下，Valora是唯一一個能夠實現無信任的移動交易的錢包，具有易於使用的UX，幾乎零費用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一樣向全球任何人發送資金

next.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
next.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions

localize.description: 互联网不是万能的，您的手机浏览器也不应该是万能的。有了Insight，您可以在手机上轻松快速地创建扩展程序，我们会在您浏览时推荐最有用的扩展程序。只搜索您信任的来源；阻止广告、跟踪器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系统上使用无代码扩展进行超级搜索和浏览

localize.description: 互聯網不是萬能的，您的手機瀏覽器也不應該是萬能的。有了Insight，您可以在手機上輕鬆快速地創建擴展程序，我們會在您瀏覽時推薦最有用的擴展程序。只搜索您信任的來源；阻止廣告、跟蹤器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系統上使用無代碼擴展進行超級搜索和瀏覽
